name: eYantra Industries
overview: eYantra Industries, Ltd., a brand merchandising company, provides merchandising strategies and solutions to connect customers, employees, and stakeholders to brands in India and internationally. It offers Confix, an online brand store solution that enables offering a host of products and services, comprising company-branded merchandise and end use brands to employees across geographies; RewardX, a customized solution for rewarding and recognizing employees, keeping in view of business objectives; and LoyaltyX, a research based technology driven loyalty enhancement solution that increases the perceived value of the incentives for loyalty. The company also provides RetailX, a solution to setup a physical store, as well as to address design aspects, fixtures and fittings, merchandise, and POS; and BrandX, a solution for merchandise consulting. eYantra Industries, Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Hyderabad, India with branches in Bangalore, Mumbai, Delhi, and Chennai.

funding_rounds.source_description: Gifts company eYantra raises $7.5 m for expansion
